      • removeTenantPartitions

        public void removeTenantPartitions​(Collection<Table> tables,
                                   String schemaName,
                                   int tenantId,
                                   String tenantStagingTable)
        Description copied from interface: IDatabaseAdapter
        Detach the partitions from each of the given tables. The tenantStaingTable is the name of the table used to record the "into" table name that the detached partition becomes.
